channel.title: 路透财经

item.title: 美国司法部和 15 个州起诉苹果公司，称这家 iPhone 制造商垄断了智能手机市场，损害了小型竞争对手的利益，并抬高了价格。
item.description:
The US Department of Justice and 15 states sued Apple as the government cracks down on Big Tech, alleging the iPhone maker monopolized the smartphone market, hurt smaller rivals and drove up prices https://t.co/9TTQfqiIsN pic.twitter.com/UbCqIROWNA

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 21, 2024

item.title: 观看：内存芯片制造商美光科技（Micron Technology）周四大涨，创下历史新高，因为其强劲的收入预期助长了对人工智能硬件需求飙升的乐观情绪，这将把这家英伟达（Nvidia）供应商推向新的高峰。
item.description:
WATCH: Memory chipmaker Micron Technology surged to a record high on Thursday after its strong revenue forecast fanned optimism that soaring demand for AI hardware would take the Nvidia supplier to new peaks https://t.co/78eo4oqaYS pic.twitter.com/psGJUGwbhU

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 21, 2024

item.title: 英国央行将利率维持在 16 年高位。但行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，英国经济正处于未来降息的正确轨道上：
item.description:
The Bank of England kept interest rates at a 16-year high. But Governor Andrew Bailey said Britain's economy is on the right track for future rate cuts.
More here: https://t.co/EF4i4LYsWA pic.twitter.com/g1t9H9TzkG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 21, 2024

item.title: 观看：一项调查显示，欧元区 3 月份的商业活动距离恢复增长仅有一线之隔，表现优于预期，该调查还显示通胀压力一反近期趋势，在本月有所缓解
item.description:
WATCH: Euro zone business activity was within a whisker of returning to growth in March, outperforming expectations, according to a survey which showed inflationary pressures bucked a recent trend and eased this month https://t.co/Sb39WeNEue pic.twitter.com/MIS7GVCb92

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 21, 2024

item.title: 观看：社交媒体平台 Reddit 的首次公开募股定价为每股 31 美元至 34 美元，达到了目标区间的最高价，共募集资金 7.48 亿美元，为萎靡不振的技术 IPO 市场注入了急需的活力。
item.description:
WATCH: Social media platform Reddit priced its initial public offering at the top of its targeted range of $31 to $34 per share, raising $748 million and giving the ailing technology IPO market a much-needed boost https://t.co/4w7bdox9KX pic.twitter.com/nZwu1cOl6O

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 21, 2024

item.title: 观看：美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）在近期通胀数据升温的情况下仍坚持宽松政策，日本日经平均股价创下历史新高，日元从四个月低点强劲反弹。
item.description:
WATCH: Japan's Nikkei share average hit a record high and the yen rebounded strongly from a four-month low, after the US Federal Reserve stuck to its easing path despite recent heated inflation readings https://t.co/vtTRWLRFu3 pic.twitter.com/QDjxoqmlvq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 21, 2024

item.title: 观看：据媒体报道，美国司法部正准备起诉苹果公司，指控其阻止竞争对手访问其 iPhone 的硬件和软件功能，从而违反了反垄断法。
item.description:
WATCH: The US Department of Justice is preparing to sue Apple for allegedly violating antitrust laws by blocking rivals from accessing hardware and software features of its iPhone, according to a media report https://t.co/yCi9G8AefL pic.twitter.com/POiRinmztj

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 21, 2024
